events.message: I received my order last week, but I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
The case has been classified as a refund request based on the customer's message about money back.
Assigning this refund request to agent Sarah J. for further handling and customer communication.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to request a refund. I'll be happy to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want to return the product for refund processing?
My order number is 987654321. The product arrived damaged and is not functioning as described, so I want a full refund.
We apologize for the inconvenience. I have initiated the refund process and you should receive the amount within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate you starting the refund process right away.
The refund case is now resolved. Please let us know if you have further questions or concerns.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory.
Yes, I got the refund today. Thank you very much for your assistance throughout the process.
Closing the refund case as the customer has confirmed receipt of the refund and is satisfied with the resolution.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to collect feedback on the refund handling experience.
